Name: chivalry-medievalwarfare
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Chivalry: Medieval Warfare and run it.

game_id.Name: GAME_ID
game_id.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

gameparameters.Name: Game Parameters
gameparameters.Description: Enter your game parameters seperated with ? and start with a ? (don't put spaces in between eg: ?port=7000?queryport=7010)

extragameparameters.Name: Extra Game Parameters
extragameparameters.Description: Type in your Extra Game Parameters seperated with a space and - (eg: -seekfreeloadingserver)

steam-username.Name: Steam-Username
steam-username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

validateinstallation.Name: Validate Installation
validateinstallation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

steam-password.Name: Steam-Password
steam-password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

udp1-gameport.Name: UDP1 - GamePort
udp1-gameport.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the Ports in your 'Game Parameters' Variable)

udp2-gamequeryport.Name: UDP2 - GameQueryPort
udp2-gamequeryport.Description: UDP Gamequeryport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the Ports in your 'Game Parameters' Variable)

udp3-steamqueryport.Name: UDP3 - SteamQueryPort
udp3-steamqueryport.Description: UDP Steamqueryport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the Ports in your 'Game Parameters' Variable)
